typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		vin as string,
		customerVehicleName as string,
		brand as string,
		productionDateday as string,
		productionDatemonth as string,
		productionDateyear as string,
		type as string,
		model as string,
		{emissionLevel } as string,
		volvoGroupVehiclecountryOfOperation as string,
		volvoGroupVehicledeliveryDate as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleregistrationNumber as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleroadCondition as string,
		volvoGroupVehicletransportCycle as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		vin as string,
		customerVehicleName as string,
		brand as string,
		productionDateday as string,
		productionDatemonth as string,
		productionDateyear as string,
		type as string,
		model as string,
		{emissionLevel } as string,
		volvoGroupVehiclecountryOfOperation as string,
		volvoGroupVehicledeliveryDate as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleregistrationNumber as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleroadCondition as string,
		volvoGroupVehicletransportCycle as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleconnectedServices0 as string,
		volvoGroupVehicleconnectedServices1 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE VolvoTrucksVehicles'],
	postSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE VolvoTrucksVehiclesNewData'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkNewData
